description: {"blocks":[{"key":"f1f6m","text":"Protocol to extract histone proteins using a hypotonic lysis buffer for isolation of nuclei prior to acid extraction of histones that is easily amenable to label-free MS owing to the lack of detergents in the lysis buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"btf6r","text":"DISCLAIMER – FOR INFORMATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY; USE AT YOUR OWN RISK","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"te49","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9gp9e","text":"The protocol content here is for informational purposes only and does not constitute legal, medical, clinical, or safety advice, or otherwise; content added to protocols.io is not peer reviewed and may not have undergone a formal approval of any kind. Information presented in this protocol should not substitute for independent professional judgment, advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Any action you take or refrain from taking using or relying upon the information presented here is strictly at your own risk. You agree that neither the Company nor any of the authors, contributors, administrators, or anyone else associated with protocols.io, can be held responsible for your use of the information contained in or linked to this protocol or any of our Sites/Apps and Services.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":160,"length":12},{"key":1,"offset":631,"length":12}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8br83","text":"Start from a dry (snap-frozen) cell pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fj0q8","text":"Add hypotonic lysis buffer (HLB) to cell pellet: 200 µL for 1x106 cells and resuspend softly ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":49,"length":22},{"style":"sup","offset":64,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eq3p4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"56ahf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2vvnc","text":"HLB buffer: 10 mM Tris-HCl pH 8.0, 1 mM KCl, 1.5 mM MgCl2 supplemented with 1 mM DTT, 1 mM PMSF, Halt Protease and Phosphatase Inhibitor Cocktail 100x (78440) and phosphatase inhibitor cocktails II and III (P5726 and P0044, Sigma-Aldrich, 1 mL of cocktail for 100 mL of buffer)","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8er2b","text":"Rotate for 30 min at 4°C to promote lysis of cell membrane (mechanical shear)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9cv1","text":"Pellet the nuclei by centrifugation at 10.000g for 10 min at 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3ik62","text":"Discard the supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5g56p","text":"Resuspend the pellet in 0.4N hydochloric acid (HCl) by soft pipetting until no clumps left in solution by adding 125 µL HCl for 1x106 cells (if necessary: vortex) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":113,"length":26},{"style":"sup","offset":132,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bbauj","text":"Incubate for 30 min in acid on rotator at 4°C to promote lysis of nuclei and solubilization of histones","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"et7h4","text":"Spin down for 10 min at 4°C and 16.000 g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8i7t3","text":"Transfer supernatant to new Eppendorf (histones are present in the acid since they are alkaline proteins)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4v4gi","text":"Add, drop by drop, trichloroacetic acid (TCA) until a final concentration of 33% is reached to promote precipitation of histones and invert the tube several times (results in a milky solution)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6pe81","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9v7qt","text":"Incubate on ice for 30min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4aqv5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3buvb","text":"Spin for 10 min at 4°C and 16.000 g to pellet the histones","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ebi1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6h88s","text":"Remove the supernatant ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"663ge","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2h5d4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"74t38","text":"Be careful: the pellet is not always visible","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"j5vn","text":"Add ice-cold acetone (do not resuspend the pellet) to remove TCA, make sure the pellet is fully covered with acetone","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6h3do","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ri0t","text":"Spin for 5 min at 4°C and 16000 g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ko7g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9423m","text":"Remove the supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84pr3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bfnuk","text":"Add cold acetone again (do not resuspend the pellet) to remove TCA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"430ad","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9j9aq","text":"Spin for 5 min at 4°C and 16000 g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8l9ih","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8r30h","text":"Remove the supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3jies","text":"Resuspend in MilliQ water (50 µl for 1x106 cells)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":41,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eiq2a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4qjcl","text":"Transfer 400.000 cells to a new Eppendorf tube for gel-electrophoresis (optionally)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6l6iv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"qe5k","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e1tas","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"pfa","text":"If there are still clumps left: Spin for 10 min at 4°C and 16000 g and transfer the supernatant in a fresh Eppendorf","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d8qqk","text":"Vacuum dry the samples (SpeedVac)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ateum","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6t3l7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2oaud","text":"Store both Eppendorf tubes (for propionylation/digestion and SDS-PAGE) at -20°C or -80°C until further use","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fbvtc","text":"Dry at room temperature for 30 min (until no acetone left)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7oec5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bh074","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c7b0d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"eajlv","text":"Samples can be stored at -80°C or -20°C until further use (propionylation/digestion) or part of the sample can be prepared to perform sodium dodecyl sulfate polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis (SDS-PAGE)","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

title: Histone extraction HLB protocol

creator.name: Sigrid Verhelst
creator.affiliation: ProGenTomics, Laboratory of Pharmaceutical Biotechnology, Ghent University, Ghent, Belgium
